title: Dore Kiesselbach
text:
Dore Kiesselbach is an American <a href="poet">poet</a>.
Biography.
He graduated from <a href="Oberlin%20College">Oberlin College</a> in 1988, and the University of Iowa.
His work has appeared in "Agni", "Antioch Review", "Field", "Poetry", "Poetry Review" (UK), and other magazines.
He is married to Karin Ciano; they live in <a href="Minneapolis">Minneapolis</a>.
